title: Winter Warmth: Cozy Nights Ahead

diffuser.notes: Diffuse 15 min before bed for a restful night

spray_optional.note: Shake well and spray around the house for a cozy atmosphere

why_it_works: Frankincense promotes relaxation, while Cinnamon warms and uplifts. Ylang-ylang adds a soothing and calming touch.
safety: Avoid eyes/mucosa; keep from children & pets.
Consult a professional if pregnant, nursing, or under care.
